# Test data for quote extraction

# Double quotes
"quoted content"

# Double quotes with leading/trailing whitespace
  "trimmed content"

# Backticks
`backtick content`

# Backticks with whitespace
  `trimmed backtick`

# No quotes
unquoted content

# Empty quotes
""

# Nested quotes (should extract outer)
"outer 'inner' quote"

# Escaped quotes (literal backslash in shell)
"content with \" escape"

# Quote in middle (should extract if delimiters present)
prefix "middle" suffix

# Multiple quoted sections
"first" and "second"

# Single quote (not handled, but test behavior)
'single quoted'
